title: Jeb:MCPE0.8会在圣诞节之前发布
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2013-12-8 20:25 编辑 

Jeb:Today's FAQ is, when is MCPE 0.8 out? @_tomcc and Aron are working hard on solving the last few bugs. "Before xmas" at least.

Jeb:今天的你问我答是，什么时候才会发布MCPE0.8？Tomcc和Aron正在修复BUG，至少会在"xmas前"（视同X诞节）。

x=christ         at least ;>
